Description: National Air Cargo pleaded guilty to one count of knowingly making a material misstatement to the United States concerning fraudulent claims for freight services. NAC agreed to pay criminal restitution of $4.4 million, a criminal penalty of $8.8 million, and forfeit assets in the amount of $3.05 million. NAC  also agreed to pay $11.75 million to resolve allegations that it violated the False Claims Act.

Company: National Air Cargo Group, Inc., d/b/a National Airlines
Agency: Transportation Department Aviation Consumer Protection Division

Info Source: Extracted from a download of OSHA's Enforcment Data downloaded on 3/02/2022, available at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_catalogs.php
